name: Kadro
description:
Kadro is a software engineering firm that delivers B2C/B2B eCommerce solutions on Magento Commerce and Marketplace integrations.
Kadro provides a full range of eCommerce development and integration services including:
eCommerce strategy and consulting
B2C and B2B eCommerce website design, development, testing, and support
Magento Commerce 2 integration, custom development, and support
ERP, OMS, PIM, and CRM integrations
Marketplace integration and onboarding: eBay, Amazon, Walmart, Jet.com.
Mobile commerce and Responsive Web Design
READ MORE...
